nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Cloudy. Low around 59, with temperatures rising to around 61 overnight. Southeast wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. East southeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 54, with temperatures rising to around 56 overnight. East southeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Partly Sunny
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 11am. Partly sunny, with a high near 64. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Slight Chance Rain Showers
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 5am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. East southeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws.name: Saturday

nws.name: Sunday
